html: A cruel lord "Cruel lords"—, Nebuchadnezzar in the first place, and afterwards the whole succession of Persian kings, who in general were hard masters, and grievously oppressed the country. Note, that for ,קשה , kasheh, lord, a MS. reads ,קשים , kashim, lords, agreeable to which is the rendering of the Septuagint, Syriac, and Vulgate.
